attributes.action: Ability to buy and consume a alcoholic drink watching a premiershipFootball game
attributes.additional_details: In other sports you are allowed to enjoy an alcoholic drink during the game and football fans are being discriminated against due to the action of fans from decades ago
attributes.background: Relax the ban on drink alcohol drinking during the game.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on a similar topic which you might like to sign:

Legalise alcohol consumption at seats for English football matches
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605629
